page.title: 09RELIGION (2)
page.content: Another group which believes in {Jesus,}but as a prophet and not as the 'Son of God',is the{MUSLIMS.}Their God is known as{ALLAH}and their book is known as the{KORAN.}Mohammed was the last prophet of Allah,and is the most important to the MUSLIMS. The Asian communities go to the mosque everyday but especially on a Friday.They conform to strict religious practice which includes praying five times a day.Muslims main festival is called EID and falls twice a year. The Centre Mosque in the Gorbals area of the city is a beautiful example eastern architecture.
